Properties.Description: Gets the virtual path of the directory that contains the application hosted in the current application domain.
Properties.Name: VirtualAppPath

Properties.Description: Gets the physical drive path of the application directory for the application hosted in the current application domain.
Properties.Name: PhysicalAppPath

Properties.Description: Gets a DateTime object that is set to the current date and time on this computer, expressed as the local time.
Properties.Name: Now

Properties.Description: Gets a DateTime object that is set to the current date and time on this computer, expressed as the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
Properties.Name: UtcNow

Type.Description: DextopEnvironment provides information about hosting environment.
Type.Name: IDextopEnvironment
